title: Bug 102436: Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected in the report design, but it is not.
OB: The report designer is not properly validating the format of the date/time string when setting the default value for a 'DateTime' type report parameter.
EB: The report designer should reject any invalid date/time string that does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format when setting the default value for a 'DateTime' type report parameter.
SR: To reproduce this issue, open the BIRT report designer and create a new 'DateTime' type report parameter. In the 'default value' field, enter an invalid date string, such as '55/66/9999'.
